title: 游戏玩不了啊怎么办
author: 嘎_我勒个去
txt_content:
点开OFFLINE后就是  Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.
If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT a1dce528 --------
Generated 11-8-26 下午1:00
Minecraft: Minecraft Beta 1.3_01
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.6.0_27, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: ATI Radeon X1200 Series version 2.1.8545 Release, ATI Technologies Inc.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: input == null!
 at javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(Unknown Source)
 at oi.<init>(SourceFile:36)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:277)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:632)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 1f761f6d ----------
我的显卡驱动更新了  所有的都刚更新 也重启了    就是玩不了啊魂淡！！！！

replies.author: qe1234happy
replies.txt_content: 貌似是你的mod有冲突或没安装好！

replies.author: 嘎_我勒个去
replies.txt_content:
肿么没人啊= =
    啊咧咧！！！  求高人啊

replies.author: 嘎_我勒个去
replies.txt_content:
qe1234happy 发表于 2011-8-26 13:02 
貌似是你的mod有冲突或没安装好！
用了萝卜大人的   可以玩了   啊哈哈哈！！！！
